main event: A woman reported seeing a bright, reddish object in the sky over Valdosta, Georgia on 7 July 1949.
interesting points: The object was described as being in the shape of an electric light bulb and bright red in color., The object was seen at approximately 3:00 AM and was visible for about ten minutes., Mrs. [redacted] stated that the light illuminated the neighborhood around her home., There were no scheduled flights in the area at the time of the sighting., Residents believed there was a government laboratory dealing with guided missiles nearby.
sighted object: a bright reddish object in the shape of an electric light bulb
witness description: Mrs. [redacted] is a 65 to 70-year-old woman, considered trustworthy but nervous and imaginative.
